00014 #ifndef SFDFILE_H
00015 #define SFDFILE_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"

00020 #include "BitBuffer.h"
00021 #include "MC2CRC32.h"
00022 #include <vector>
00023 
00024 
00025 class MapBuff {
00026 public:
00027    MapBuff( const MC2SimpleString& id, BitBuffer* buff )
00028          : m_id( id ), m_buff( buff ), m_crc( 0 ) {
00029       if ( m_buff ) {
00030          m_crc = MC2CRC32::crc32( m_buff->getBufferAddress(), 
00031                                   m_buff->getBufferSize() );
00032       }
00033    }
00034 
00035    MapBuff( const MC2SimpleString& id, BitBuffer* buff, uint32 crc )
00036          : m_id( id ), m_buff( buff ), m_crc( crc ) {}
00037 
00038 
00039    MC2SimpleString& id() { return m_id; }
00040    const MC2SimpleString& id() const { return m_id; }
00041 
00042    BitBuffer* buff() { return m_buff; }
00043    const BitBuffer* buff() const { return m_buff; }
00044 
00045    uint32 crc() const { return m_crc; }
00046 
00047    bool operator == ( const MapBuff& other ) const {
00048       return crc() == other.crc();
00049    }
00050 
00051 private:
00052    MC2SimpleString m_id;
00053    BitBuffer* m_buff;
00054    uint32 m_crc;
00055 };
